chapter.title: Relatório: Relatórios de Mapa de Acessos

row.entry: O campo "Tarefa" identifica uma Tarefa do Sistema Operacional no sistema.
O "Perfil" determina o nível de segurança e acesso que um usuário que exerça este Perfil terá no Sistema.
Uma "Organização" é uma unidade de sua "Empresa" ou "Entidade Legal" - os exemplos são loja, departamento. Você pode compartilhar dados entre organizações.
Entrada de dados ou janela de exposição
O campo "Janela" identifica uma Janela única no sistema.
Usuário dentro do Sistema - Interno ou Contato de Parceiro de Negócios
O Usuário identifica um usuário único e exclusivo dentro do sistema. Este poderia ser um usuário interno ou um contato de parceiro de negócios
A Info Window é usada para procurar e selecionar registros bem como mostrar informações relevantes do registro selecionado.
O campo "Processo" identifica um único Processo ou Relatório no sistema.
O campo "Formulário Especial" identifica um Formulário Especial único no sistema.
Fluxo de Trabalho ou combinação de tarefas
O campo "Fluxo de Trabalho" identifica um Fluxo de Trabalho único no sistema.
A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients. Tenant is a synonym for Client.
The Special Form field identifies a unique Special Form in the system.
The Info window is used to search and select records as well as display information relevant to the selection.
An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.
The Process field identifies a unique Process or Report in the system.
The Role determines security and access a user who has this Role will have in the System.
The Task field identifies a Operation System Task in the system.
User within the system - Internal or Business Partner Contact
The User identifies a unique user in the system. This could be an internal user or a business partner contact
The Window field identifies a unique Window in the system.
The Workflow field identifies a unique Workflow in the system.
The Document Type determines document sequence and processing rules
Used to make more easy work with window customization

Used to define the role hierarchy of an organization. This value is added to a context variable that can be used for example to create Window Customizations.
Example:
100 - President 090 - Manager 080 - Coordinator 070 - Sales Person
Access all Organizations (no org access control) of the client
When selected, the role has access to all organizations of the client automatically. This also increases performance where you have many organizations.
The record is active in the system

There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.
Users with this role can approve their own documents
If a user cannot approve their own documents (orders, etc.), it needs to be approved by someone else.
Users with this role can export data
You can restrict the ability to export data from iDempiere.
Users with this role can create reports
You can restrict the ability to report on data.
If selected, a log of all changes is maintained.
The Manual check box indicates if the process will done manually.
A master role cannot be assigned to users, it is intended to define access to menu option and documents and inherit to other roles
If ticked, the menu is automatically expanded
Allow access to all personal records
Users of this role have access to all records locked as personal.
Allow users with role to lock access to personal records
If enabled, the user with the role can prevent access of others to personal records. If a record is locked, only the user or people who can read personal locked records can see the record.
The Read Write indicates that this field may be read and updated.
Users with this role can see accounting information
This allows to prevent access to any accounting information.
Usar Acesso de Usuários à Organização
Use Org Access defined by user instead of Role Org Access
You can define the access to Organization either by Role or by User. You would select this, if you have many organizations.
The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.
Overwrite Price Limit if the Price List enforces the Price Limit
The Price List allows to enforce the Price Limit. If set, a user with this role can overwrite the price limit (i.e. enter any price).
Search key for the record in the format required - must be unique

A search key allows you a fast method of finding a particular record. If you leave the search key empty, the system automatically creates a numeric number. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_< TableName> ", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).
